thread.title_full: Epic Hospital Billing Remote Financial Analyst Jobs- California (39603752) at Soliant Health (Los Angeles, CA)

title: Epic Hospital Billing Remote Financial Analyst Jobs- California (39603752) at Soliant Health (Los Angeles, CA)
text: Source: Soliant Health Soliant Health is actively interviewing for an Epic Hospital Billing Financial Analyst for a full-time permanent job in California. Epic HB Job Requirements: -Minimum 4 years of experience with Financial data mining, reporting and analysis. -Work with Business owners to define requirements then create production and adhoc reports. -Must have experience with Crystal Reports, infoView and SQL -Must have insurance billing and collections experience To be considered for Epic Hospital Billing permanent job with Soliant Health, please apply through this posting or contact Ryan Taylor at 561-712-5571 or email at ryan.taylor@soliant.com.
